metadata.dc:title: Exercise 1 - Data Stewardship (2020S)
metadata.dc:creator: Sibincic Aleksandar
metadata.dc:subject: Predicting total payments in Swedish Motor Insurance
metadata.dc:description: In this experiment we try to predict the sum of payments for the number of claims in Swedish Motor Insurance. Input consists of 2 datasets, namely train and test set. Using linear regression we predict the sum of payments based on claims in test set. At the end we provide a measurement for our prediction
